attributes.action: all schools to enforce anti bullying rules
attributes.additional_details:
many parents of children with special needs including myself have to deal with their special needs children being bullied in school.
Schools ignore the victims and pass it off of children being children,This is not good enough
bullying affects more than people think
all bullys should be excluded until reports are done and not ignored and allowed to carry on,EVIDENCE SHOULD BE GATHERD AND THE VICTIM SHOULD ALWAYS COME FIRST
IT IS NOT CHILDREN BEING CHILDREN IT IS CRUEL
